
TAGS:  graph, ggplot, ESS
Hall of Fame, non-pitchers
```r
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(abdwr3edata)
hof <- hof_batting
```

Based on MidCareer year, assign to baseball era
```r
?cut
hof <- hof |>
  mutate(
    MidCareer = (From + To) / 2,
    Era = base::cut(
      MidCareer,
      breaks = c(1800, 1900, 1919, 1941, 1960, 1976, 1993, 2050),
      labels = c(
        "19th Century", "Dead Ball", "Lively Ball", "Integration", 
        "Expansion", "Free Agency", "Long Ball"
      )
    )
  )
```

Count by Era
```r
hof_eras <- hof |>
  group_by(Era) |>
  utils::summarize(N = n())
hof_eras
```
Plot
```r
ggplot(hof, aes(x = Era)) + geom_bar()
```

Fancier
```r
png(file="BASEBALL/graph1.png")
ggplot(hof, aes(Era)) + 
  geom_bar() +
  xlab("Baseball Era") +
  ylab("Frequency") +
  ggtitle("Era of the Nonpitching Hall of Famers")
dev.off()
```

```r
	png(file="BASEBALL/graph2.png")
  ggplot(hof_eras, aes(Era, N)) + 
  geom_point(color = "red") +
  xlab("Baseball Era") +
  ylab("Frequency") +
  ggtitle("Era of the Nonpitching Hall of Famers") +
  coord_flip()
dev.off()
	```
